mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_tbl ( name , content , viewQty , likeQty , createDt , createId , deleteFlag) VALUES ( #{name} , #{content} , 0 , 0 , #{createDt} , #{createId} , false)
mapper.select: SELECT bt.id , bt.name , bt.content , bt.viewQty , bt.likeQty , bt.createDt , bt.createId , bt.updateDt , bt.updateId , bt.deleteDt , bt.deleteId , bt.deleteFlag FROM board_tbl AS bt LEFT JOIN member_tbl AS ct ON bt.createId = ct.id LEFT JOIN member_tbl AS ut ON ut.updateId = ut.id LEFT JOIN member_tbl AS dt ON dt.deleteId = dt.id WHERE bt.id = #{id} AND bt.deleteFlag = false
mapper.update: UPDATE board_tbl SET viewQty = viewQty + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleteFlag = false
UPDATE board_tbl SET likeQty = likeQty + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleteFlag = false
UPDATE board_tbl SET likeQty = likeQty - 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleteFlag = false
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM board_tbl WHERE name like CONCAT('%',#{searchName},'%') AND deleteFlag = false

SELECT bt.id , bt.name , bt.content , bt.viewQty , bt.likeQty , bt.createDt , bt.createId , ct.nickName AS createName , bt.updateDt , bt.updateId , '' AS updateName , bt.deleteDt , bt.deleteId , '' AS deleteName , bt.deleteFlag FROM board_tbl AS bt LEFT JOIN member_tbl AS ct ON bt.createId = ct.id WHERE bt.name like CONCAT('%',#{searchName},'%') AND bt.deleteFlag = false ORDER BY ${orderByWord} LIMIT #{rowsOnePage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
